uthure me mohothedith wishala mardhanakari palanayak thiyenawa.janajiwithaya samanya thathwayata pathwenna denne nathiwa asamanya hamuda pidanayak ehe pawathwagena yanawa.mewa therum ganna nam demala minissunwa aashraya karanna wenawa.eda eltitiee ekata bayen hitapu damila minissu ada hamudawata bayen ina්ne kiyana eka ethakota obatama watahewi.ayitien eka witharak balala thirana ganna eka waradiyi.modayi.rate adhikarana swadhinathwaya kelesila kiyana eka boru nemeyi neda?chandana kathriaarachchige minimarum chodana nithipathima illa askaragannawa oba dakka neda?rate manawa himikam kadawim gana hoyala balanna swadhina adhikarana yanthranayak naha kiyala mun kiyaddi – kochchara katuka wunath – ee aththa neda?lasantha wikramathunga wage madhyawedin ge marana gana parikshanayakwath rajaya kale naha neda?mewage waradi ape palakayo kala nisa neda munlata agili gahanna idak hadila thiyenne?mun me kamituwa pathkarannema mahinda rajapaksha ekka aawa ekagathawayak matha padanam wela neda?

farwis maharuf labagath lakunu sankhyawa 23 ki.pera tharagayedi kandurata pile jayagrahanaye niyamuwa wu kumar sangakkara eeye tharagayata krida kale natha.pandu yawimedi thilakarathna dilshanta amatharawa ishara amarasinha lakunu 18 kata kadulu 4 k binda damuwe ya.tharagaye jayagrahanaya athkara ganimata basnahira kandayamata waya wuye oowara 14.1 k pamani.kandurata pila - 120 - siyaludena dawi (oowara 19.4)chanaka wijesinha 42, farwis maharuf 23 (ishara amarasinha 18/4 , thilakarathna dilshan 23/3, dilruwan perera 22/2)basnahira pila - 121 kadulu nodawi (oowara 14.1)dilshan munawira nodawi 57,thilakarathna dilshan nodawi 56.
